name: T - Couple Talk
_source: speak;Emma; Do I want to spend the evening with Nicole and Carson?
choice;yes_no;Spend time with the married couple?;Yes,No;backable
speak;Emma; They look deep in thought...{w} I should leave them be tonight.
speak;Nicole; Oh Emma, get your rear over here and look at them stars!
speak;Emma; I don't think I've ever seen the night sky so lit up{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; It's just magical, ain't it, sugarplum?
speak;Carson; The stars always look magical when I'm with you, honey.
speak;Emma; You two sure are in love, huh?
speak;Nicole; I took one look at him and knew we were gonna tie that knot!
speak;Carson; And I knew I was going to marry her from the way she looked at me{tgm}...{tgm}{w} after she was bucked off her horse.
speak;Nicole; Hehe, and in the middle of seein' stars, I saw his face.
speak;Emma; I haven't spent that much time away from home,{w} but it's heartwarming to see that love can bloom everywhere.
speak;Nicole; Sugar, you can find love anywhere.{w} Whether you're soarin' in the sky or sinkin' in the mud,{w} there ain't no climate too harsh for love.
speak;Emma; Nicole, has anyone ever told you how wise you sound?
speak;Nicole; Nope!{w} But thanks for the kind words, though, sugar.
speak;Carson; Nicole's gentle sweetness stands out at first,{w} but she's a wise soul when you get to know her.{w} It's how she made me her prisoner of love.
speak;Nicole; And it's why I wouldn't trade you for any other man.{w} I'd travel barefoot over a field of broken glass for you!
speak;Carson; How about nobody does any crawling over broken glass?
speak;Nicole; How about I make you some more biscuits after this is all over?{w} Ain't nothing gonna stop me from treating you! Not man nor monster!
speak;Emma; Heh, well, I guess I've learned never to discount the power of love{tgm}...
